Description of incident: Customers who used debit or credit cards at Ward's Nursery and Garden Center may have had their information taken.  Dozens of people from various banks reported fraudulent activity on their cards and Ward's Nursery and Garden Center appears to be a common link.  Reports of fraudulent activity date back to December and people who visited Ward's Nursery and Garden Center are urged to check their cards for fraud until the cause of the breach is determined.
